title: Why Scarlett Johansson Took a Breast Pump to the Oscars - Vogue
text: Scarlett Johansson Once Took a Breast Pump to the Oscars February 6, 2017 9:39 PM Photo: Getty Images Two years ago, Scarlett Johansson swept down the Oscars red carpet with a bombshell side-shave, a plunging emerald green Versace gown—and a breast pump tucked into her purse. Yes, the actress revealed in a recent interview that with a 5-month-old daughter at home, she couldn’t afford to attend the ceremony without it. “I was nursing and every ounce is like liquid gold,” she said of carefully sticking to a regular pumping schedule, a task breastfeeding mothers must adhere to regularly. Johansson is one in a long line of actresses pulling the curtain back on breastfeeding—prompting a frank look at the logistical demands that are often hidden behind the scenes. From Blake Lively ’s People’s Choice Awards photo tagged #breastfeedingmama to Olivia Wilde ’s unapologetic nursing snaps with daughter Daisy, stars are turning the spotlight on the realities behind breastfeeding and a woman’s right to do so. Consider it a stigma-busting testament to feminine power—and a future that’s gloriously female. In This Story: Scarlett Johansson Recommended For You
